issue.title: receiver.tdm.qq.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://receiver.tdm.qq.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Freceiver.tdm.qq.com) ### Comment ``` 腾讯旗下的游戏基本上开启反广告adguard后，均无法进入（以前是可以的） ``` ``` Username: @宋创创 ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: e.mail.ru
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

5.1.102

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://e.mail.ru/messages/inbox?octavius=off

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Popups filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Block WebRTC, Hide Referrer from third-parties (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При нажатии "Очистить" рядом со "Спамом" или "Корзиной", в старой версии почты, должно появляться всплывающее окошко с подтверждением действия, но вместо этого скрывается один из основных, несущих элементов, в результате чего страница становится пуста.

 Причиной тому является правило `e.mail.ru#?#.balloon:upward(1)` в "Фильтре всплывающих окон".

2. <details><summary>Screenshot:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1b1ce02e-e3c3-4942-ae92-714d8a5f7907)
</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
